name: Rending Fury

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Base attack bonus +6, rend special attack.

sections.text: You deal rend damage if you hit with half the normal natural attacks your rend requires. For example, a troll that has this feat can rend when it hits with one claw attack, while a girallon that has this feat must hit one target with two claw attacks to rend. You can only make this rend attack once per round.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You easily tear your enemies limb from limb with your natural attacks.
